javadoc:
VersionControlAction is an abstract class that can be extended by each specific version
 control action to be taken on a domain file.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if there is at least one of the provided domain files can be 
 or is version controlled.
methods.name: isAddToPopup
methods.comment:
Returns true if there is at least one of the provided domain files can be 
 or is version controlled.

methods.javadoc:
Determines the project repository for tool associated with this action.
 The repository may be null.
methods.name: checkRepository
methods.comment:
Determines the project repository for tool associated with this action.
 The repository may be null.

methods.javadoc:
NOTE: do not call this from a non-Swing thread.
@return true if the repository is null or is connected.
methods.name: checkRepositoryConnected
methods.comment: NOTE: do not call this from a non-Swing thread.

return.comment: true if the repository is null or is connected.

methods.name: canCloseDomainFile
methods.comment: Checks if anything is preventing a particular domain file from closing.

return.comment: true if the specified domain file can be closed.

name: VersionControlAction
comment:
VersionControlAction is an abstract class that can be extended by each specific version
 control action to be taken on a domain file.
